author: Washington Irving
message: Love is never lost. If not reciprocated, it will flow back and soften and purify the heart.
title: Thought of the day

author: Anne Frank
message: We all live with the objective of being happy; our lives are all different and yet the same.
title: Thought of the day

author: Byron Pulsifer
message: Many people think of prosperity that concerns money only to forget that true prosperity is of the mind.
title: Thought of the day

author: Thich Nhat Hanh
message: To be beautiful means to be yourself. You do not need to be accepted by others. You need to accept yourself.
title: Thought of the day
